results.title: Effects of simvastatin on the expression of inducible NOS in acute lung injury in septic rats.
results.text_hl: Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on the expression of @GENE_NOS2 @GENE_24599 @@@inducible NOS@@@ in @DISEASE_Acute_Lung_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D055371 @@@acute lung injury@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Infectious</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001170 @@@septic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: [Effect of the simvastatin in abdominal sepsis of diabetic rats].
results.text_hl: Peripheral blood @GENE_TNF @GENE_24835 @@@TNFalpha@@@, @GENE_IL1B @GENE_24494 @@@IL-1beta@@@, @GENE_IL6 @GENE_24498 @@@IL-6@@@, @GENE_CRP @GENE_25419 @@@C-reactive protein@@@, procalcitonin, leukocytes and neutrophils were lower in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ and non @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetics@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Infectious</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001170 @@@septic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, than after saline treatment.

citations.NLM: Araújo-Filho I, Jácome DT, Rêgo AC, Azevedo IM, Egito ES, Medeiros AC. [Effect of the simvastatin in abdominal sepsis of diabetic rats]. Rev Col Bras Cir. 2010 Feb;37(1):39-44. PMID: 20414574

results.title: HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor simvastatin profoundly improves survival in a murine model of sepsis.
results.text_hl: METHODS AND RESULTS: @SPECIES_10090 @@@Mice@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and rendered @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Infectious</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001170 @@@septic@@@ by @DISEASE_Cecal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002429 @@@cecal@@@ ligation and @DISEASE_Corneal_Perforation @DISEASE_MESH:D057112 @@@perforation@@@ (@DISEASE_Cecal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002429 @@@CLP@@@) show a mean survival time close to 4 times the value found in untreated @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Merx MW, Liehn EA, Janssens U, Lütticken R, Schrader J, Hanrath P, Weber C. HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor simvastatin profoundly improves survival in a murine model of sepsis. Circulation. 2004 Jun 1;109(21):2560-5. PMID: 15123521
citations.BibTeX: @article{15123521, title={HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor simvastatin profoundly improves survival in a murine model of sepsis.}, author={Merx MW and Liehn EA and Janssens U and Lütticken R and Schrader J and Hanrath P and Weber C}, journal={Circulation}, volume={109}, number={21}, pages={2560-5}}

results.title: [Influence of simvastatin treatment on Toll-like receptor 4 in monocytes of peripheral blood in patients with sepsis and severe sepsis].
results.journal: Zhonghua Wei Zhong Bing Ji Jiu Yi Xue
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group received @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg daily orally for at least 15 days.

citations.NLM: Shao H, Wang C, Zhu W, Huang X, Guo Z, Zhang H, Qin B. [Influence of simvastatin treatment on Toll-like receptor 4 in monocytes of peripheral blood in patients with sepsis and severe sepsis]. Zhonghua Wei Zhong Bing Ji Jiu Yi Xue. 2016 Feb;28(2):159-63. PMID: 26911949
